dt: {bc}one that {a_link|follows} the opinions or teachings of another
{bc}a sheet added to the first sheet of an indenture or other deed
{bc}a machine part that receives motion from another part
{bc}a spring-loaded plate at the bottom of a firearm's magazine that angles cartridges for proper insertion into the chamber
{bc}one who subscribes to a feed especially on social media

pt: {sc}follower{/sc} {sc}adherent{/sc} {sc}disciple{/sc} {sc}partisan{/sc} mean one who gives full loyalty and support to another. {sc}follower{/sc} may apply to people who attach themselves either to the person or beliefs of another.
{sc}adherent{/sc} suggests a close and persistent attachment.
{sc}disciple{/sc} implies a devoted allegiance to the teachings of one chosen as a master.
{sc}partisan{/sc} suggests a zealous often prejudiced attachment.

shortdef: one in the service of another : retainer
one that follows the opinions or teachings of another

dt: {bc}a civilian (such as a prostitute) who follows a military unit to attend or exploit military personnel
{bc}a disciple or follower who is not of the main body of members or adherents
{bc}a politician who joins the party or movement solely for personal gain

shortdef: a civilian (such as a prostitute) who follows a military unit to attend or exploit military personnel
a disciple or follower who is not of the main body of members or adherents; especially : a politician who joins the party or movement solely for personal gain
